Room.Name: The Sleeping Deer Real Estate Office
Room.ShortDescription: You are in the office of the only real estate company in Oceancrest.
Room.LongDescription: The company handles all real estate transactions in the city, both residential and commercial. If you would like to purchase an exclusive apartment in the Ashton Falls Resort, you must be at least level 14. However, anyone with enough gold may purchase a business in Oceancrest. There are various pubs, shops and small businesses in the city that may be owned by players. This office is also a postal facility, and you may send mail to Styx if you wish to purchase real estate. You can also buy a Rules of Business, or an Ashton Falls Agreement here. A list is available for your perusal.
